channel.title: How do I change my home starting place?
channel.description:
[b]How do I change my home starting place?[/b]
I know how to change the ::home teleport but I don't know how to change the home starting place where you start a new account, And thats where you start.
Thanks.

item.title: How do I change my home starting place?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

ziplock:

this is a very simple fix, first of all you are probably trying to find it in the client.java…it is not located thare go

[size=7pt][b]Its Player.java, sorry =[/b][/size]

Go into Player.java and search for

        // initial x and y coordinates of the player

just below that you should see a set of coords. replace them with what you would want. It should be right below the player look.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change my home starting place?

item.title: How do I change my home starting place?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

this is a very simple fix, first of all you are probably trying to find it in the client.java…it is not located thare go to search

heightLevel = 0;

then the wole thing should look like

heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = CORDX; teleportToY = CORDY;
once you find this edit the cords to wharever you want them to spawn whene they join
oops kevlord you got here before me…soz

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change my home starting place?

item.title: How do I change my home starting place?
item.dc:creator: @kevlord kevlord
item.description:
@kevlord wrote:

Go to player.java and search // initial x and y coordinates of the player
ok after you will see teleportToX = ****; // ****; teleportToY = ****; // ****;

change the **** to your new home coord (the left columns is when you create a new char the place you spawn and right culumns is when you die)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change my home starting place?
